column5: Anyone have any experience on Lake Panache?  I have a friend who has fished it twice and recommended it to me, problem is. He sometimes stretches things a bit, he doesn't do it in a malicious way. He just loves to talk and he is a great Guy.  With that being said, I would like to get a second or third opinion.  Thanks, Jeff
It is a huge body of water to fish so you need to target a small area to fish. I have not been there in over 30 years so I cannot help you.
